resources.string:
What is Hazard?

 Any Situation or Activity Potential for injury and / or Property damage

What is Unsafe Condition?

 Any situation place supportive for human injury or property damage

What is Unsafe Act?

 Any personal activity may lead to injury or property damage or both
What is Near Miss?\n\n A Near Miss is an unplanned event that did not result in injury, illeness, or damage-but had the potential to do so.
What is Accident?\n\n An accident is an incident which has given rise to injury, ill health or fatality and /or property damage.
